php.io.File

type
class
available in
php
API for reading and writing to files.

Static Methods

public append(path : String, binary : Bool) : FileOutput

public copy(src : String, dst : String) : Unknown

public getBytes(path : String) : haxe.io.Bytes

public getContent(path : String) : String

public putContent(path : String, content : String) : String

public read(path : String, binary : Bool) : FileInput

public stderr() : FileOutput

public stdin() : FileInput

public stdout() : FileOutput

public write(path : String, binary : Bool) : FileOutput
